overview: A dangerous beauty. An evil millionaire. A man willing to risk anything. A multi-million dollar master plan. A family swimming in corruption. A nymph gripped by passion. A streetwise seductress. A blonde designed for pleasure. A detective enslaved by a platinum heiress. A jealous mistress. Lesbian games. A man imprisoned by a woman's desire. The ultimate dynasty of lust, power and lies.... Cecil Howard's greatest erotic achievement, created shamelessly for everyone who ever dreamed of a secret sin.
tagline: The Ultimate Dynasty of Lust, Power, & Lies!
title: Sinners
